0.Name: Post Vigor Hoodie
0.Description: The promotional hoodie you recieved after joining the Vigor Underwater Research Initiative. Do not dry clean.

1.Name: Bug Bounty Hoodie
1.Description: A hoodie given only to those who have found security vulnerabilities in Compensation VR. Anyone who's wearing this is worthy of respect.

2.Name: Skittles Hoodie
2.Description: Developer-Only item, made as a joke.

3.Name: Maid Dress
3.Description: A maid dress from approx. 1930. Purchasable in the store and can be obtained from activities.

4.Name: LGBT Pride Hoodie
4.Description: A rainbow shirt, obtainable from the store and from Pride Month events.

5.Name: Asexual Pride Hoodie
5.Description: A shirt with the Asexual Pride flag emblazened across it. Purchasable from the store and obtained from Pride Month events. (you can also get it if you ask Bubby nicely ;D)

6.Name: Asexual Pride Hoodie
6.Description: A shirt with the Asexual Pride flag emblazened across it. Purchasable from the store and obtained from Pride Month events. (you can also get it if you ask Bubby or Bobrobot1 nicely ;D)

7.Name: Aromantic Pride Hoodie
7.Description: A shirt with the Aromantic Pride flag emblazened across it. Purchasable from the store and obtained from Pride Month events. (you can also get it if you ask Bobrobot1 nicely ;D)

8.Name: Agender Pride Hoodie
8.Description: A shirt with the Agender Pride flag emblazened across it. Purchasable from the store and obtained from Pride Month events. (you can also get it if you ask Bubby or Bobrobot1 nicely ;D)

9.Name: Transgender Pride Hoodie
9.Description: A shirt with the Transgender Pride flag emblazened across it. Purchasable from the store and obtained from Pride Month events. (you can also get it if you ask Bubby or Bobrobot1 nicely ;D)

10.Name: Bisexual Pride Hoodie
10.Description: A shirt with the Bisexual Pride flag emblazened across it. Purchasable from the store and obtained from Pride Month events. (you can also get it if you ask Bubby nicely, or if DementedSpy gifts it to you.)

11.Name: Lesbian Pride Hoodie
11.Description: A shirt with the Lesbian Pride flag emblazened across it. Purchasable from the store and obtained from Pride Month events. (you can also get it if you ask Bubby nicely.)

12.Name: Non Binary Pride Hoodie
12.Description: A shirt with the Non Binary Pride flag emblazened across it. Purchasable from the store and obtained from Pride Month events. (you can also get it if you ask Bubby or Bobrobot1 nicely ;D)

13.Name: Drysuit
13.Description: A sealed plastic suit designed to keep you warm and dry in the freezing water around Post Vigor. Issued upon joining the Vigor Underwater Research Initiative.

14.Name: Early Supporter Hoodie
14.Description: A hoodie given to people who have supported Compensation VR since the early days. Thank you for keeping us going, and have fun!

15.Name: DementedSpy Hoodie
15.Description: A custom hoodie made for DementedSpy. Hey there dudes and dudeettes!

2.Name: Checkered Skirt
2.Description: hehe skirt go spinny, now in pretty colors :>

4.Name: Jeans
4.Description: A simple pair of blue jeans. It has pockets!

1.Name: Sunglasses
1.Description: A pair of cheap sunglasses from the on-post store. They'd probably break if you dropped them.

2.Name: Mirrored Sunglasses
2.Description: A nice pair of aviator sunglasses.

2.Name: Long Hair 1
2.Description: Long hair without much extra styling.

3.Name: Long Hair 2
3.Description: Long hair with a bit of an angle cut into it.
